column4: is possible to get 32 bit color on ati mobility radeon 9000 IGP ?? i'm running ubuntu 5.04 on my laptop
i got 24 bit but is 32 bit possible ?
better yet you tell me why 32bit is better than 24bit or is it really better as 24bit could be better?! hm ;)~
honestly dunno :) i was asking cuz my xp supported 32bit ... more colors i guess .
Note that there is no 32 bit color. its a tricky term for 24bit really ;)~
long as your in 24bit in linux thats great
its that same as your 32bit in windows
my screen still looks a bit fuzzy though
yup laptop lcd (acer travelmate 2200) with subpixel smoothing
change it to subpixel lcd mode & hit details & choose hinting full
yup i had already set it at that ...
also your gonna want ms core fonts to make the web look yummy
